content.statement: vascular:venous:cvd-003-corona is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Venous that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

clinical_features.appearance: Fan-shaped or sunburst pattern of intradermal vessels at ankle
clinical_features.significance: Indicates underlying venous reflux in 80-90% of patients
clinical_features.evaluation: Should prompt duplex ultrasound for reflux assessment

sources.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.

clinical_pearls: Fan-shaped pattern at ankle is highly specific for venous reflux
Present in 80-90% of patients with documented reflux
Should prompt duplex evaluation for underlying reflux
